# UISegmentedControl.Segment.alone

**Case**

The standalone segment, capped on both ends.

## Declaration

```swift
case alone
```

## Discussion

Applies only when [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISegmentedControl/numberOfSegments] is 1.

## Constants

- **UISegmentedControl.Segment.any**: Specifies any segment.
- **UISegmentedControl.Segment.left**: The capped, leftmost segment.
- **UISegmentedControl.Segment.center**: Any segment between the left and rightmost segments.
- **UISegmentedControl.Segment.right**: The capped, rightmost segment.
